dt-example.title: Full grouping controls
dt-example.info:
ColumnControl has a set of four different content type buttons built in to control the grouping of data in a DataTable. This example demonstrates all four in a dropdown:
* `-content rowGroup` - toggle to enable row grouping on the specified column * `-content rowGroupAdd` - add a secondary (or n-level) column to the grouping of data * `-content rowGroupRemove` - remove a column from grouping * `-content rowGroupClear` - remove all columns from grouping.
